summary: The module provides an example implementation of a graph neural network workflow using PyTorch and DGL. It defines a simple feedâ€‘forward neural network and a generic model wrapper, includes utilities for loading and preprocessing graph data, and contains scaffolding for training and evaluating the model, although several helper routines are not currently invoked.
business_intent: Showcase how to construct, train, and assess a scalable graph neural network (e.g., SIGN) for node classification tasks, serving as a reference implementation for developers and researchers working with PyTorch and DGL.
